title: If Big Food Buys Your Favorite 'Natural' Food Brand, Will You Trust It?
text:
If Big Food Buys Your Favorite 'Natural' Food Brand, Will You Trust It? 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
Big food companies are buying up small ones. Honest Tea is now part of Coca-Cola. The French company Danone controls Stonyfield yogurt. Horm...
